name: Scribble me' Timbers; Scribble, Draw, Bribe, Judge, Collect
blurb: The next social drawing game t' get addicted to. Challenge yer friends by giv'n a scribble. 'Tis themed and drawn, then judged fer LOOT

rewards.reward: \u2620 SWABBIE REWARD \u2620 \r\nYe get a YO HO! exclusive thank you email including artwork from the game to use fer yer device wallpaper! \u25d5 UPDATE for this pledge = The full paid version of the game for your PC, MAC, iOS mobile or Android device.  The $10 pledge now receives both games, phase 1 and phase 2 when released.

\u2620 CABIN BOY/GIRL REWARD \u2620 A YO HO! email \u25d5 Listed on the website and game credits as an official backer \u25d5 The full paid version of the game for your PC, MAC, iOS mobile or Android device.

\u2620 POWDER MONKEY REWARD \u2620 A YO HO! email \u25d5 Listed on the website n' game credits as n' official backer \u25d5 The full paid version of the game for your PC, MAC, iOS mobile or Android device \u25d5 An exclusive in-game "pet" fer your ship (it's a surprise!) \u25d5 Exclusive matching bandanas for you AND your avatar (Please add $15 additional for international shipping)

\u2620 FIRST MATE REWARD \u2620 A YO HO! email \u25d5 Listed on the website n' game credits as n' official backer \u25d5 The full paid version of the game for your PC, MAC, iOS mobile or Android device \u25d5 An exclusive in-game "pet" fer your ship \u25d5 Exclusive matching bandanas for you AND your avatar \u25d5 A Scribble me' Timbers custom t-shirt (Please add $15 additional for international shipping)

\u2620 MASTER GUNNER REWARD \u2620 A YO HO! email \u25d5 Listed on the website n' game credits as n' official backer \u25d5 The full paid version of the game for your PC, MAC, iOS mobile or Android device \u25d5 An exclusive in-game "pet" fer your ship \u25d5 Exclusive matching bandanas for you AND your avatar \u25d5 A Scribble me' Timbers custom t-shirt (Please add $15 additional for international shipping) \u25d5 Yer weight in gold (in game gold for purchasing game content) \u25d5 Exclusive sound track of the game theme music and sounds (digital download)

\u2620 NAVIGATOR REWARD \u2620 A YO HO! email \u25d5 Listed on the website n' game credits as n' official backer \u25d5 The full paid version of the game for your PC, MAC, iOS mobile or Android device \u25d5 An exclusive in-game "pet" fer your ship \u25d5 Exclusive matching bandanas for you AND your avatar \u25d5 Yer weight in game gold \u25d5 Exclusive sound track \u25d5 An Exclusive weapon fer yer ship! \u25d5 An Exclusive "ship" part that gives you a special ability in sea battles (hint: It's a Figurehead) \u25d5 Limited edition hand printed t-shirts (3 to choose from) - Note: Very limited because we burn the mold.  (Please add $15 additional for international shipping)

\u2620 QUARTER MASTER REWARD \u2620 A YO HO! email \u25d5 Listed on the website n' game credits as n' official backer \u25d5 The full paid version of the game for your PC, MAC, iOS mobile or Android device \u25d5 An exclusive in-game "pet" fer your ship \u25d5 Exclusive matching bandanas for you AND your avatar \u25d5 Yer weight in game gold \u25d5 Exclusive sound track \u25d5 An Exclusive weapon fer yer ship \u25d5 An Exclusive "ship" part \u25d5 Limited edition hand printed t-shirts (3 to choose from) \u25d5 Exclusive in-game pirate avatar in your likeness WITH original water color painting of your avatar (Painted by award winning artist and internationally published author of "Water Color for the First Time": Kory Fluckiger) - (Please add $15 additional for international shipping)

\u2620 CAPTAIN REWARD \u2620 All the Quarter Master Rewards + Exclusive "PIRATE KING STATUS" with INFINITE GOLD!  Your Avatar (which at this point is a likeness of YOU) gets a Pirate King Crown. Note: Just because you get unlimited gold doesn't mean you conquered the game...there will still be achievements and battles t' win, Arrrrr
